title: Find the Fragments
giverName: Hael Storm - Venture League Faction Leader
returnToName: Hael Storm - Venture League Faction Leader
description: Smash any o' the red or white Venture Koi chunks you see, and find them Imagimeter pieces!
objective: Gather the 8 chunks of the Imagimeter Base from red Venture Koi wreckage on Crux Prime.
